title: Electoral Reform Act 2022 (No. 30 of 2022), hereby order as follows:
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Electoral Reform Act 2022
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Electoral Reform Act 2022 

(Establishment Day) Order 2023.
text_norm: 1 order may cited electoral reform act 2022 (establishment day) order 2023

title: Electoral Reform Act 2022 (No. 30 of 2022), hereby order as follows:
heading: 2. The 9th day of February 2023 is appointed to be the establishment day
text_raw:
2. The 9th day of February 2023 is appointed to be the establishment day 

for the purposes of the Electoral Reform Act 2022 (No. 30 of 2022). 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

8 February, 2023. 

DARRAGH O’BRIEN, 

Minister for Housing, Local Government and Heritage. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 10th February, 2023. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [31] 3
text_norm: 2 9th day february 2023 appointed establishment day purpose electoral reform act 2022 (no 30 2022) given official seal 8 february 2023 darragh brien minister housing local government heritage notice making statutory instrument published iris oifigiuil 10th february 2023 31 3

title: Electoral Reform Act 2022 (No. 30 of 2022), hereby order as follows:
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

In exercise of the powers conferred on the Minister for Housing, Local 
Government and Heritage by section 7 of the Electoral Reform Act 2022 (No. 
30 of 2022), this Order appoints 9 February 2023 as the day on which An 
Coimisiúin Toghcháin is established. 

 
 
 
 
 
 4 [31]
